hiveArticle.title: Visit to Iskcon Temple on the Eve of Janmashtami
hiveArticle.body:
As in my [previous post](https://steemit.com/india/@codingdefined/krishna-janmashtami) I have explained what exactly is Krishna Janmashtami. So I have visited Iskcon temple on the occasion of Janmashtami, which is a Radha Krishna Temple.

Exterior of Iskcon Temple

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQma3zues8NXNdDfUuaaMSLWz1Rg8vHZ4aPCWfyhKGGmPE1/image.png)

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmNdGccFYh9DgV7vQZH3uwmudQULUFGBkhLMgarSy337fN/image.png)

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmReuhWVE9VKyc5DuRfLLjMSXVwZgJvBEvSoP3TubAyXDL/image.png)

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWzmA3rkUUMMiczd68yGvX5u1wFhhZUusp59w7zqnryik/image.png)

Interior of Iskcon Temple

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmVGGZQnki9Jk2dViQsz7gW3ti6AHNRmjPM21hHRtFUZPS/image.png)

Camera : Nokia 6
